data.name: FunBall 3D
data.detailed_description:
FunBall 3D is a casual game, that involves platforming and collecting score, and if you are not doing that you are racing against the clock, Funball will travel around different maps and challenges to get to the end with each map offering a different challenge so try to stay on the platform and not fall into the abyss.

Funball uses real physics for movement to add the to the challenge specially when another funball joins the race, either you can work together to finish the level or you fight against each other.

Race against time or friends even the against the maps good luck.

Race against time or friends even the against the maps good luck.
data.short_description: FunBall 3D is a casual game, that involves platforming and collecting score, and if you are not doing that you are racing against the clock, Funball will travel around different maps and challenges.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 8,10
  • Processor: i3 7th gen Amd Equivalent
  • Graphics: GTX 750m
  • Sound Card: any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 8,10
  • Processor: i9 11th gen Amd Equivalent
  • Graphics: GTX 1050ti
  • Sound Card: any
